item.title: Report X-2025030671
item.description:
Report X-2025030671

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-22T21:13:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-10
  • City: CHELMSFORD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED THREE AEROSOL CANS OF NEWPORT ZERO EXTRA PURIFIED BUTANE GAS, 10 OUNCE SIZE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM RHODE ISLAND USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 333627, MOTION INDUSTRIES, 1605 ALTON RD, BIRMINGHAM AL 35210-3770.

item.title: Report E-2025030228
item.description:
Report E-2025030228

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-22T21:13:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-20
  • City: EAST DEERFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: Berkshire & Eastern Railroad
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 2500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: GATX 219374 arrived at the East Deerfield Yard at 0220 EST on February 20, 2025. Car department inspecting in the AM smelled propane. Hepaco (certified car repair group) called and found the vapor valve open and the vapor line plug was less than tool tight. Additionally, Hepaco also found the liquid line B plug to be less than tight.
